main event: A bright object was observed by a witness moving in a relatively straight line at high speed near Dayton, Ohio.
interesting points: The object appeared round or oval in shape and emitted no sound,The object was initially observed approximately 45 degrees above the horizon and passed overhead at an estimated altitude of 3,000 feet,As it neared the horizon, the object began to pulsate and change in intensity,The total duration of the observation was about 10 minutes,The sighting concluded as an unidentified aerial phenomenon.
sighted object: a bright, round or oval object
